0.post_text:
Long before Instagram, classic cameras gave us instant photos.

In 1979, McDonald’s gave us an instant classic – The Filet-O-Fish® :)
 
Today, you can enjoy the same quality white fish at a price you’ll love – the Filet-O-Fish® Extra Value Meal is yours for only $5!

1.post_text:
We've received some amazing contest entries of super mums and super dads over the past few days. 

Today, we'd like to congratulate Joreen Leow, Joseph Sng, Ang Yong Hwee and Winnie Yap, for each winning a breakfast treat for their amazing parents. Here's Joseph with his supportive, super mum - she's also young spirited and game enough to join him in fun activities!

11 more breakfast giveaways are up for grabs, so keep those entries coming! To enter:
1. Share a picture of your amazing Mum or Dad on Instagram. In your caption, tell us how and why your nominee is a Super Mum or Super Dad and why they deserve breakfast on us. Remember to hashtag your entry with #MCDBreakfastDay and #MCDBreakfastDaySG.

2. Send us a private message on Facebook with your full name, Instagram username and email address*

Contest closes on 6 March, 12 midnight. 

Winners will be announced on 4 March and 7 March. 
 
For contest terms and conditions, visit https://mcdonalds.com.sg/promotions/McDNBDSMSD.

*Information requested will be used to contact winners

Here you go, folks. Excuse me, but how is a filet-o-fish unbeatable with half a slice of cheese AND a shrinking burger? #justsaying p.s. it's not "classic" when you don't bother to maintain the good standards as how it used to be a long long time ago.
One.is never.enough why.not have 3?

Groen was working ungodly hours and had twins to feed at home—$75 was not cutting it. He noticed that a restaurant nearby owned by the Big Boy chain was doing something different—they had a fish sandwich. “My dad told me, ‘If I’m gonna survive, I’ve got to come up with a fish sandwich,’” says Paul. So Groen went to work creating a simple, battered, halibut-based prototype, with a slice of cheese between two buns.

Read more: http://www.smithsonianmag.com/arts-culture/the-fishy-history-of-the-mcdonalds-filet-o-fish-sandwich-2912/#TJZOOIZ86WitkriQ.99
Im having the Nacho Cheese Fillet o fish. now 🍔🍟🍷

4.post_text:
True classics never go away. In fact, they get better with time. Re-introducing the irresistible classic Filet-O- Fish®, now at an unbeatable $2 in-stores. 

Dive in today and find out why it’s been Singapore’s favourite fish burger since 1979.

Visit https://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/promotions/2dollarfiletofish/ for more information, and terms & conditions.

comments.message: Hi I just went to your drive in Mcdonald and I ordered one double fish o fillet and one single and I am very upset that your  customer service  do not tell me that you have a promotion offer for single burger.  when I saw yr receipt I am shock to note that it cost $2 for single and $5.80 for double.  if I had known earlier abt yr offer I wud hv ordered 3 single fish burger and it wud only cost me $6.    I hope that yr CS wud in future inform yr customer of the offer so that we can make better decision which is value for money and not look stupid and silly to have paid $5.80 for the double.
Please do not order using credit cards! They double charge and when I call in, they needed 2 weeks to refund back. Just imagine if I didn't check my account... I would have been charged twice.

5.post_text:
We’re bringing back our annual breakfast giveaway with National Breakfast Day this March! This year, beyond our public giveaway, we want to express gratitude to mums and dads, with breakfast deliveries on us! 

According to our National Breakfast Day study, 6 in 10 parents, and close to 8 in 10 mothers, feel too busy on weekday mornings, and 1 in 2 parents wished they had more time for breakfast. 

If you have a super mum/ super dad, tell us your story and stand a chance to treat them to breakfast. 

For contest terms and conditions, visit https://mcdonalds.com.sg/promotions/McDNBDSMSD

8.post_text: We would like to assure our customers that despite the situation at U.S. West Coast ports, any disruption to our supply of condiments and ingredients is only temporary. We have a variety of supply sources and in this instance, McDonald’s Singapore has secured supplies from other McDonald’s approved producing countries for most of our products. There are, however, some products for which we are unable to source the same product from any McDonald’s approved producing countries outside of the USA. Hence, these products will be temporarily out of stock.  Please refer to http://mcdonalds.com.sg/press_release/update-on-west-coast-port-congestion/ for the list of products.

Flash the LINE app on your mobile phone to purchase the Forever Love Special Edition Box. Available at $19.80 with any Extra Value Meal, only in McDonald’s restaurants from 9 February 2015, 11am. Grab yours while stocks last!
